title: Tech Abyss Portfolio
description: An interactive 2D open-world portfolio website built as a playable game using Phaser 3. Explore the world, talk to NPCs, and discover content areas in this unique gaming portfolio experience.

title: Speech to Text
description: A speech recognition application that converts spoken words into text. Features real-time transcription, multiple language support, and audio processing capabilities.

title: Text to QR
description: A utility application that converts text input into QR codes. Generate QR codes for URLs, contact information, or any text content with customizable styling options.

title: HTML Fight
description: An interactive HTML-based game or application. Experience web-based gameplay with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript creating engaging user interactions.

title: Brick Breaker Remake
description: A classic brick breaker game remake built with Java for Android. Learning android development through game development - a fun and educational project.
